==[http://scripts.mit.edu/~sgross/fx-quartz-pdf-1.1.3.xpi Add PDF plugin to Firefox (Mac OS X)]==

----

==Install Instructions==
  # Click the "Add PDF plugin" link above
  # Click "Allow" from the drop-down infobar
  # Click the "Install" button from the popup menu


===System Requirements===
  * Firefox 3.0 or later
  * Requires Mac OS X v. 10.4 or later

=== Troubleshooting ===
Having trouble viewing PDFs? Check the tips on the [Troubleshooting] page.
